  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or better, dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB Mem, supports OpenGL 3.2
  • Sound Card: Directx compatible sound card
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB Mem, supports OpenGL 3.2
  • Sound Card: Directx compatible sound card
